title: TV actor Mrunal Jain throws a party for birthday girl Rashami Desai : Celebrity, News - India Today
text:
TV actor Mrunal Jain throws a party for birthday girl Rashami Desai Rashami Desai's rakhi brother Mrunal Jain arranged a Sufi night for the actress at her residence. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Shweta Keshri A + A - Mrunal Jain throws a surpise birthday party for Rashami Desai. Picture courtesy: Instagram/mrunaljainofficial 
Popular actress Rashami Desai, who currently stars in Colors' Dil Se Dil Tak rang in her birthday with rakhi brother Mrunal Jain. The duo first bonded on the sets of Uttaran, and their friendship has become only stronger with time. A video posted by Rashami Desai (@imrashamidesai) on Feb 12, 2017 at 7:12pm PST 
Rashami shared a video of her birthday with a note that said -- "The best best start to my birthday! Bhai gave me the best surprise ever #SufiNight scenes at home. Thank you @mrunaljainofficial and @sweetiejain21 for the most precious surprise ever #BlessedWithTheBest @happydemic_mike @sumitbhardhwaj." The actor, who was last seen in Nagarjuna--Ek Yoddha, had also arranged for some Sufi music for the night.
